News.headline: Interview: Shaun Donnellan On Signing For The Daggers
News.page_title: Interview: Shaun Donnellan On Signing For The Daggers
News.URL_keywords: Interview: Shaun Donnellan On Signing For The Daggers
News.short_description: Shaun Donnellan gives an exclusive interview to Daggers Player on his debut for the club on Monday and how he is settling into the squad.
News.description:
“Monday was a good game, obviously they had a player sent off in the first quarter of the match which made the game a bit slower, and we have a really talented group of players here at Dagenham from experienced long season pros to young talents so I’m happy to be here.

There is competition for the centre back spot now but I’ve just go to play well and train well, If I don’t perform on the pitch I’ll get pulled out of the team, there is a lot of competition for places in this team and that’s why Dagenham are high up in the table.

On Monday there was a lot of leaders on the pitch, I was surprised everyone was very vocal and the two players in front of me (Boucaud and Raymond) were fantastic in keeping me in line and telling me if I was doing something wrong but in a positive way.

We are going into Saturday against North Ferriby definitely looking to win, we want to get promoted and hopefully I can play well and impress the management staff.”    

Daggers Player HD subscribers can watch the full interview here
